question: What is the name of Indiaâ€™s former national athletics coach and Dronacharya awardee, who recently passed away?
explanation:
Veteran athletics coach and Dronacharya awardee Joginder Singh Saini recently passed away at the age of 90. 
He had served as the Chief national athletics coach for several years between 1970 and 1990. He had also been the chief coach of the then Amateur Athletics Federation of India. Saini received the prestigious Dronacharya Award in 1997 for his contribution to Indian athletics.
